morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does oneself or is done to one
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are people or things being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that happens to (or for?) people or things being discussed
